title: Coalition seeks to increase transparency on life science career prospects

title_detail.value: Coalition seeks to increase transparency on life science career prospects

summary: Nine U.S. research universities and a major cancer institute today announced plans to give would-be life scientists clear, standardized data on graduate school admissions, education and training opportunities, and career prospects.

summary_detail.value: Nine U.S. research universities and a major cancer institute today announced plans to give would-be life scientists clear, standardized data on graduate school admissions, education and training opportunities, and career prospects.
